DOC.brief_summary: To investigate high cup/disc ratio child .
DOC.detailed_description: ophthalmologic examination 1. cycloplegic refraction 2. axial length anterior chamber depth 3. intraocular pressure B. optic nerve head retinal nerve fiber layer 1. disc photography 2 . Heidelberg Retina Tomograph
DOC.criteria: high cup/disc ratio 0.5 age : five twelve previous surgery ( except strabismus surgery ) previous glaucomatous medication history poor cooperate child .
